entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
